title: Sri Lanka rupee trading weaker, bond yields steady
byline: An auction of 100,000 million rupees Treasury bills was ongoing.

title: Sri Lanka stock market trading halted on Wealth Trust error trade
byline: Wealth Trust Securities which issued shares at Rs7.00 traded by error at 25,000

title: US Ambassador Julie Chung to leave Sri Lanka after nearly four years
byline: Deputy Chief of Mission Jayne Howell will serve as Chargé d’Affaires, until the arrival of a new US Ambassador.

title: Sri Lanka central government debt falls to 93.1-pct by Sept, despite depreciation
byline: The rupee has since depreciated to 310 to the US dollar

title: Sri Lanka power ministry to bring generation cost below Rs25 rupees: Minister
byline: As a general policy we want to buy all electricity units on a competitive basis and bring down costs

title: Sri Lanka's Wealth Trust issues statement on error trade on its CSE debut
byline: The CSE halted trading and cancelled all trades on Wednesday on all shares

title: Sri Lanka, European Union sign 8mn euro grant agreement
byline: Will support Sri Lanka’s transition "to more sustainable and environmentally responsible agricultural practices

title: Sri Lanka CSE cancels all morning deals on Wealth Trust error trade
byline: A large trade at 25,000 rupees led to a trade of around 150 billion rupees.

title: US action in Venezuela underscores its Western hemisphere ambitions: Fitch Ratings
byline: Outcomes of the US’s removal of Venezuelan leader Maduro are highly uncertain, but could have geopolitical implication...

title: Sri Lanka's Durdans announces share sub division
byline: Share sub-division will see both voting and non-voting shares split into 4.

title: Sri Lanka Customs sets 2026 revenue target at Rs.2.207 bn, less than last year
byline: Revenue from vehicle imports estimated to fall by around 70% in 2026 compared to last year

title: Sri Lanka rupee depreciates further, bond yields edge down on mid-tenors
byline: Bond yields edged down on the 2028s and 2029s.

byline: The amphibian aircraft is involved in carrying tourists

title: Sri Lanka stock market closes cancelling all trades after error trade
byline: Trading will resume tomorrow as usual

title: Sri Lanka Treasury bill yields rise, 6-month up 17bp
byline: All offered 100 billion rupees of bills sold
